original_text: Haman told them how rich he was, and how many sons he had. He told them of all the things that the king had done to give him great honour. He told them that he was now more important than all the king's other rulers and officers.
korean_text: 자기의 큰 영광과 자녀가 많은 것과 왕이 자기를 들어 왕의 모든 지방관이나 신하들보다 높인 것을 다 말하고

sentences.original_text: Haman told them how rich he was
sentences.korean_translation: 하만은 그들에게 자신이 얼마나 부자인지 말했다

sentences.original_text: and how many sons he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신에게 아들이 몇 명이나 있는지도 말했다

sentences.original_text: He told them of all the things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 모든 것들에 대해 말했다

sentences.original_text: that the king had done to give him great honour
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그에게 큰 영예를 주기 위해 행한 모든 것들

sentences.original_text: He told them that he was now more important
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 이제 더 중요하다고 말했다

sentences.original_text: than all the king's other rulers and officers
